citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a completed Record of Acquisition of Dogs and Cats on Hand (APHIS Form 7005) for 4
recently acquired domestic cats. The facility stated these four cats (1 orange Munchkin, 1 calico Munchkin, and 2
Bengals) were obtained for the purpose of breeding. Without this form completed, the facility cannot provide information to
trace the origins of animals in their possession. The facility shall use the Record of Acquisition of Dogs and Cats on Hand
(APHIS Form 7005) to make, keep, and maintain the information required by 2.75(a)(1). To be corrected by October 11,
2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
BEVERLY HICKS, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR n

narrative:
2.75(a)(2) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The facility does not have a completed Record of Acquisition of Dogs and Cats on Hand (APHIS Form 7005) for 4
